actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 23.
name: Derrick Kahala Watson
nominee: Derrick Kahala Watson, of Hawaii, to be United States District Judge for the District of Hawaii
position: United States District Judge for the District of Hawaii
